content: As an AI language model, I don't have access to the latest news and updates about The Advocate's efforts to become more inclusive. However, based on past reports, some changes that The Advocate has made include increasing coverage of underrepresented LGBTQ+ communities, advocating for transgender rights and highlighting the struggles of queer people of color. The publication has also focused on expanding their representation of queer voices, both in their editorial staff and in the articles they publish. They have also featured articles that highlight the intersectional experiences of LGBTQ+ individuals, bringing attention to the diverse and complex experiences within the community.
